room_title: Escape room "The Mobster's Speakeasy" by Time Trapped Escape Room in Tampa
room_description:
It's the roaring 20â€™s people are living the high life. Even though it is the height of Prohibition and alcohol is illegal, people are still drinking. You and your gang were caught smuggling hooch into New York City. Although the barrels were destroyed there is still rampant criminal activity in the city. In order to avoid the slammer, The Mayor is forcing you and your gang to become inside informants and help take down the notorious crime boss Lucky Luciano.
Your task is to gain access to the Speakeasy known as the 21 Club, find the evidence of his crimes and escape before Luciano returns in 60 minutes. Do you and your crew have what it takes to get the evidence and get out before you are caught?
